Question
========
A student lists the following two advantages of a parametric test over a non-parametric alternative:

Advantage I: the higher power

Advantage II: the broader usability

Are these indeed both advantages of a parametric key?

  
Answerlist
----------
* No, neither
* Yes, both
* No, only I
* No, only II
